entry.title: China's Xinjiang Region Has Been Locked Down for Months, Casting Shadow Over Zero-Covid Easing
entry.content: Local governments in the region have described the lockdowns as temporary and targeted, but accounts from residents and travelers suggest they have been widespread.

entry.title: Russia Expands Shelling of Kherson, as Power Shortages Drag On in Kyiv
entry.content: Russian forces stepped up their shelling of the southern Ukrainian city of Kherson, killing seven people and injuring at least 21 others, according to local officials.
